channel.title: Need help with an error
channel.description:
Ok, i got a new computer and lost everything from an old server i was working on. I decided to start fresh but i get an error.
This is what it says.
******** Client loading... 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...
Now i'm pretty sure is has something to do with my PATH variable but i'm not sure whats wronge with it
Here are all the things iv tried
[code]:\Program Files\jdk6_13\bin\java
;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;.
;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk6_13\bin;.
;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6_13\bin;.
;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6._13\bin\java.exe;.[/code]
Alot of peaple have tried to help me but none have help me figure it out.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2009, 02:45:20 pm[/size][hr]my CLASSPATH is
[code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
if you need to know

item.title: Need help with an error
item.dc:creator: @i_aint_yo_mama i aint yo mama
item.description:
@i_aint_yo_mama wrote:

Speak in noob for me? I dont have a client of my own yet. I’m using another servers client to play.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2009, 03:17:18 pm[/size][hr]Wait i just got understood, If the jar file is what clients usually use, then yes, its probably what the client is using.

Read full topic

@o.O_O.o wrote:

Forgive me, as I do not have a client with me, but memory suggests clients using theme to open jar files?

item.title: Need help with an error
item.dc:creator: @i_aint_yo_mama i aint yo mama
item.description:
@i_aint_yo_mama wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:2, topic:274957”]That’s exactly what my classpath says, yet it is irrelevant. Here’s my path:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;

your path didnt work for mine. I’m starting to wonder if it has nothing to do with my CLASSPATH and Path.

Read full topic
